title: E6 The Human Hair Version and the Worst Social Studies Class Ever
description: In episode 6, Em watches Christine’s mind explode over the notorious story of Robert the Doll. Christine tells the story of the Elizabeth Smart kidnapping, reminding Em where she got her compulsion to lock her doors. Turn on your alarm system and grab the nearest drink. We’re going to remind you why you need it.
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
